original: NILSSON, Gustaf Adolf, Kamrer, Lund, f Höör 13/2 75 av lantbruk Nils Andersson o Theolina Persson, gm Mathilda Andersson. Fridhems fhsk 90—91, Hvilans lantm.sk 96— 97. Bokh å Trollebergs gård Lund 97—03, tjm Lundaort mej.frn Lund sed. 04, bokh 04—14, kamr sed. 14, omb.m Torna o Bara hds ömsesid branförsäkr.frn sed. 16. ProPstGM. Hobby: Släktforskn. 0NI1LSSON, Gustaf Samuel, Fabrikör, Herr-Ijunga, f Mölltorp, Skarab l, 18/8 88 av forti-fikationsarb J örn o Anna Nilsson, gm Ellen Ahlström. Inneh möbelfabr i Herrljunga sed. 18. Ldstingsman sed. 35, led av municipalflm o kommunalflm, ordf i municipalflm fr 36, led av municipalnmd fr 25 o byggn.nmd fr 26. Ordf i Herrljunga lokalavd av Fp fr 31.
translated:
NILSSON, Gustaf Adolf, Accountant, Lund, born in Höör on February 13, 1875 to farmer Nils Andersson and Theolina Persson, married to Mathilda Andersson. Attended Fridhems agricultural school from 1890 to 1891, and Hvilan agricultural school from 1896 to 1897. Worked as a bookkeeper at Trolleberg Farm in Lund from 1897 to 1903, then as a farmhand at Lundaort Dairy in Lund since 1904. Became a bookkeeper in 1904 and an accountant in 1914. Also served as a representative for the mutual fire insurance of Torna and Bara districts from 1916. Active in the Church Council. Hobby: Genealogy research.

NILSSON, Gustaf Samuel, Industrialist, Herrljunga, born in Mölltorp, Skaraborg County, on August 18, 1888 to fortification worker Jöran Nilsson and Anna Nilsson, married to Ellen Ahlström. Owner of a furniture factory in Herrljunga since 1918. Served as a member of the County Council since 1935 and was involved in the municipal board and building committee. Chairman of the municipal board from 1936, member of the municipal council since 1925, and member of the building committee since 1926. Chairman of the local chapter of the Liberal Party in Herrljunga from 1931.
